And, I want to channel the opportunity to my"kababayans" or fellow Mindanao people where I can possibly be a good help to travel to Mindanao and speak the native dialect of the lumads or Visayan dialect to promote this particular project or opportunity that can enhance and develop a good community service and enterprenuership in Mindanao,Philippines. I am currently in the US but not working,except my husband. Due to my family's needs in the Philippines that I have difficulty providing them with their needs as or resources here is also limited, viewing on TFC regarding KIVA program makes me excited to give a try and perhaps, I can be part for any developmental program for Mindanao.
